Author: lover_007
Text: I hear u. I’m lying in bed super hungry and tired but proud of the weight I’ve been shedding yet guilty also for the 1000 calorie “cheat day” I had today and I’m literally punching the air holding 5 pound weights in each hand trying to get my heart rate up  bc anything else is too exhausting 😅 gLaMoUr~

Author: littlebluezombie
Text: This used to be me, hardcore restricting all week and then giving in to crazy weekend binges. It wasn’t until I stopped restricting my favorite foods and started eating satisfying meals 3x a day that I truly saw consistent results. It’s hard to let go, but it’s worth it.
